Package tw.jruletest

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • tw.jruletest.Runner
  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    Runner acts as the main controller of the testing framework. From here, the test classes are analyzed and new test suites are generated. The file structure is also cleaned on each run through by removing any existing generated tests and removing all .class files.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main entrypoint into the system. Rules are extracted, code is generated and tests are created using this method as well as calling the TestExecutor to execute the tests. Clean up of generated tests and .class files is carried out from this method.
        Parameters:
        args - <path to root folder>: the path to the folder containing the 'src' folder. Using no arguments assumes JAR is placed in same folder as the 'src' directory.

      • getCurrentMethod

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentMethod()
        Gets the method from which rules are currently being extracted
        Returns:
        the name of the method

      • runCommand

        public static void runCommand​(java.lang.String command)
                       throws CompilationFailureException
        Executes the required command (usually javac commands)
        Parameters:
        command - the full command to execute
        Throws:
        CompilationFailureException - thrown if the command failed

      • clearClassFiles

        Removes all .class files from the project structure

      • addTestClass

        public static void addTestClass​(java.lang.String className,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> rules)
        Adds a new test class and its extracted rules to the stored set of rules
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class from which the rules were extarcted
        rules - a map for the methods in the class and the rules extracted from them

      • getRuleSets

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getRuleSets()
        Gets all the rules for all the classes
        Returns:
        a map of all the rules extracted from all the classes
